summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3423 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 14, Brooklyn Addition, being the Alley between Brooklyn Avenue and University Way, from East 41st Street to East 42nd Street; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 42512, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
